scripts.build:css: node -e "const path = require('fs').existsSync('/usr/local/bundle') ? '/usr/local/bundle/gems/bootstrap-5.3.3/assets/stylesheets' : require('child_process').execSync('bundle show bootstrap', {encoding: 'utf8'}).trim() + '/assets/stylesheets'; require('child_process').execSync('sass ./app/assets/stylesheets/application.sass.scss:./app/assets/builds/application.css --no-source-map --load-path=node_modules --load-path=' + path, {stdio: 'inherit'});"
